Articles.Content: It always gives me an error when i play it, i even deleted the kopernicus that was there and replaced it with a new download, the image is the error im getting; https://imgur.com/OazaaMG
do you have the correct version of kopernicus for 1.8.1 together with the dependencies (with the 1.8.1 versions too)?

1.  Kopernicus does not function by itself. I assume you're using Kopernicus to make or play a planet pack? If not, that might be part of the problem.

2.  Check to make sure the planet pack you are trying to use is compatible with the downloaded version of Kopernicus. For example, 1.9.1 Planet Pack will likely result in an error with 1.8.1 Kopernicus.

3.  Check to make sure you've installed the planet pack and Kopernicus correctly. Usually, mod files are placed inside KSP's GameData folder. Check the mod page(s) for instructions on how to download them correctly.

4.  If requirements 1-3 are satisfied and you are still getting an error, then I have no idea what's going on....
